de.mrapp.android.util.view

Class ElevationShadowView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ImageView
      • de.mrapp.android.util.view.ElevationShadowView

  • public class ElevationShadowView
extends ImageView
    A view, which can be used to visualize the shadow of an elevation on pre-Lollipop devices.
    Since:
    1.2.2

    • Constructor Summary

      • ElevationShadowView

        public ElevationShadowView(@NonNull
                           Context context,
                           @Nullable
                           AttributeSet attributeSet,
                           @AttrRes
                           int defaultStyle)
        Creates a new view, which can be used to visualize the shadow of an elevation on pre-Lollipop devices.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource

      • ElevationShadowView

        public ElevationShadowView(@NonNull
                           Context context,
                           @Nullable
                           AttributeSet attributeSet,
                           @AttrRes
                           int defaultStyle,
                           @StyleRes
                           int defaultStyleResource)
        Creates a new view, which can be used to visualize the shadow of an elevation on pre-Lollipop devices.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource
        defaultStyleResource - A resource identifier of a style resource that supplies default values for the view, used only if the default style is 0 or can not be found in the theme. Can be 0 to not look for defaults

    • Method Detail

      • getShadowElevation

        public final int getShadowElevation()
        Returns the elevation of the shadow, which is visualized by the view.
        Returns:
        The elevation of the shadow, which is visualized by the view, in dp as an Integer value

      • setShadowElevation

        public final void setShadowElevation(int elevation)
        Sets the elevation of the shadow, which should be visualized by the view.
        Parameters:
        elevation - The elevation of the shadow, which should be set, in dp as an Integer value. The elevation must be at least 0 and at maximum 16

      • getShadowOrientation

        public final ElevationUtil.Orientation getShadowOrientation()
        Returns the orientation of the shadow, which is visualized by the view.
        Returns:
        The orientation of the shadow, which is visualized by the view, as a value of the enum ElevationUtil.Orientation. The orientation may either be LEFT, RIGHT, TOP, BOTTOM, TOP_LEFT, TOP_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT or BOTTOM_RIGHT

      • setShadowOrientation

        public final void setShadowOrientation(@NonNull
                                       ElevationUtil.Orientation orientation)
        Sets the orientation of the shadow, which should be visualized by the view.
        Parameters:
        orientation - The orientation, which should be set, as a value of the enum ElevationUtil.Orientation. The orientation may either be LEFT, RIGHT, TOP, BOTTOM, TOP_LEFT, TOP_RIGHT, BOTTOM_LEFT or BOTTOM_RIGHT

      • isParallelLightEmulated

        public final boolean isParallelLightEmulated()
        Returns, whether parallel light is emulated, or not.
        Returns:
        True, if parallel light is emulated, false otherwise

      • emulateParallelLight

        public final void emulateParallelLight(boolean emulateParallelLight)
        Sets, whether parallel light should be emulated, or not.
        Parameters:
        emulateParallelLight - True, if parallel light should be emulated, false otherwise
